DAText: Once your account is deleted, all its resources and data will be permanently deleted. Before deleting your account, please download any data or information you wish to keep.
AppDescription: Create your free family tree, preserve your family history, and connect with the past. Simple, convenient, and accessible to everyone. Start exploring your roots today!
verification_message: Thank you for registering! Before getting started, please verify your email by clicking the link we sent you. If you didn't receive the email, we can send it again.
verification_success: A new verification link has been sent to your email.
